useCases.name: End-to-End Functional Testing
useCases.description: Automatically generate, execute, and maintain UI test scripts as applications evolve. This allows for continuous validation of site functionality without manual intervention.

useCases.name: Exploratory Testing & Bug Discovery
useCases.description: Agents autonomously navigate web applications, discover hidden functionality, and surface edge cases or regressions that manual testers might miss.

useCases.name: UI Regression Testing
useCases.description: Testing visual changes and ensuring consistency across different environments, browsers, or device emulations (e.g., mobile vs. desktop).

useCases.name: Web Data Extraction & Scraping
useCases.description: Reading and extracting structured information from pages—like product prices, user reviews, or analytics metrics—for business intelligence or compliance.
